#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
     ll t,n,x,r,sum;
     scanf("%lld",&t);
     while(t--)
     {
         scanf("%lld",&n);
         x=n;
         sum=0;
         while(x!=0)
         {
             r=x%10;
             sum+=r;
             x/=10;
         }
         cout<<n*(1<<sum)<<'\n';
     }
    return 0;
}
